author: Unity
description:
Stream and review CAD Models with the Unity Industry Viewer Template

In this technical tutorial, you'll learn how to set up and use the Unity Industry Viewer template—a ready-to-use foundation for building collaborative, cloud-connected 3D experiences. This video takes you from an empty project to streaming your own 3D models for a real-time collaborative review.

See what's possible:
- Create a new project using the Industry Viewer Template from GitHub.
- Connect your project to Unity Cloud to enable services like Asset Manager and multiplayer.
- Prepare complex CAD and BIM models for 3D data streaming.
- Load and explore your 3D models streamed directly from the cloud.
- Use built-in collaboration tools like 3D annotations, section cuts, and XR support.

The Viewer Template provides a customizable workflow that lets industrial teams visualize, review, and discuss complex 3D data in real time. You can adapt it for your own AEC, manufacturing, or automotive projects.

Download the Un
title: Build a collaborative 3D viewer in Unity using the Industry Viewer Template

author: Unity
description:
Designing 2D game art in Photoshop? Unity's PSD Importer package allows you to import PSD files, while preserving all Photoshop layers as individual elements within Unity. The inspector offers options to include hidden layers, enable layer groups, or use Merge mode for a single sprite import. Plus, you can continue working in Photoshop, and all updates will automatically reflect in Unity.

Learn more in docs: https://on.unity.com/AI_NavDocs

Find more free Unity learn resources: https://on.unity.com/Learn

Check out the full tutorial: https://on.unity.com/PSDImporter

#gamedev #unitytips #unity3d #unitylearn
title: Unity 6 tips: PSD Importer #gamedev #gamedevelopment #unity
